issue.title: [Refactor]: Use SymPy's built-in torch export
issue.body:
Seems like SymPy now has a native PyTorch export: https://github.com/sympy/sympy/pull/27760. I think it would reduce internal complexity if we depend on that rather than hand-rolling our own.

The one downside is that those exported modules are not trainable. But maybe that's actually better, depending on how people actually want to use the model? Would be a breaking change though.
